column2: (let ((orig (default-value 'buffer-read-only))) (unwind-protect (progn (setq-default buffer-read-only t) (with-temp-buffer (insert (concat "A" (make-string 1 10) (make-string 1 10) "B")) (goto-char 1) (condition-case err (progn (transpose-paragraphs 1) (subst-char-in-string 10 124 (buffer-string) t)) (error (car err))))) (setq-default buffer-read-only orig)))
